name: Capurtle
description:
Your eight warriors (blue) battle eight enemy warriors (red) for control of the inner sanctum. Play is controlled by a bag containing twenty tokens...one for each of the sixteen warriors...three "ATTACK!" tokens...and a "REFILL BAG!" token.

Random tokens are drawn from the bag and acted upon. When a warrior token is drawn that warrior may perform up to six actions. (One for each of the warrior's remaining strength points.) When an "ATTACK!" token is drawn all warriors in the attack zones of opposing warriors take hits which reduce their strength. When the "REFILL BAG!" token is drawn the bag is refilled and the drawing of tokens resumes.
